# About
A basic light gray theme for the Nintendo 3DS HOME Menu.

# Installation
Download the theme ZIP file from the releases page, extract it, transfer the folder to your console's themes directory, and use [Anemone3DS](https://github.com/astronautlevel2/Anemone3DS) to apply the theme to your HOME Menu.
